Name: Permanent Forum on Indigenous Issues
Description: Experts serving in personal capacity | Advises ECOSOC & UN on indigenous issues; raises awareness; coordinates UN-wide activities; promotes implementation of UN Declaration on Rights of Indigenous Peoples across multiple sectors.

Name: Committee of Experts on Public Administration
Description: Experts serving in personal capacity | Advisory body to ECOSOC on public administration; studies good governance, supports implementation of SDGs, issues norms and guidance.

Name: Committee on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights
Description: Experts serving in personal capacity | Monitors implementation of the International Covenant on Economic, Social & Cultural Rights (ICESCR); reviews State reports; issues concluding observations, general comments; hears complaints under Optional Protocol.

Name: Committee of Experts on International Cooperation in Tax Matters
Description: Experts serving in personal capacity | Provides expert advice to enhance capacity for tax cooperation and mobilization of domestic resources; develops international standards on taxation.

Name: Development Policy Committee
Description: Experts serving in personal capacity | Main advisory role on international development issues; evaluates development trends & policies; provides guidance for policy coherence for sustainable development.

Name: Committee of Experts on the Transport of Dangerous Goods
Description: Government Expert Bodies | Develops the UN Model Regulations for transport of dangerous goods; harmonizes global transport standards.

Name: International Standards of Accounting and Reporting
Description: Government Expert Bodies | Promotes international accounting standards & corporate sustainability reporting; supports transparency and comparability.

Name: Global Geospatial Information Management
Description: Government Expert Bodies | Coordinates UN‑wide geospatial strategy; promotes use of geospatial data for sustainable development, disaster management.

Name: UN Group of Experts on Geographical Names
Description: Government Expert Bodies | Standardises geographical names; develops toponymy guidelines for use by UN and member states.

Name: Commission on the Status of Women
Description: Principal intergovernmental body on gender equality & women’s empowerment; sets global standards, reviews progress under Beijing Declaration; issues agreed conclusions.

Name: Commission on Narcotic Drugs
Description: Drives UN drug policy; monitors implementation of drug conventions; reviews trends, develops policy recommendations on drug control.

Name: Commission for Social Development
Description: Promotes social development; provides policy guidance on social integration, poverty eradication, youth, ageing and disabilities.

Name: Commission on Population and Development
Description: Reviews population trends; provides policy guidance integrating population issues into development planning, notably via the Programme of Action of ICPD.

Name: Statistical Commission
Description: Highest UN statistical authority; sets global statistical standards; coordinates international statistical activities; oversees UN data strategy.

Name: Commission on Crime Prevention and Criminal Justice
Description: Sets global policy on crime prevention, criminal justice, and rule of law; oversees UN crime programs and supports member state action.

Name: Commission on Science and Technology for Development
Description: Advises ECOSOC on science, technology and innovation; assesses trends & advises on ICTs for development.

Name: UN Forum on Forests
Description: Promotes sustainable forest management; facilitates partnerships, mobilizes resources and advises ECOSOC on implementation of UN Strategic Plan on Forests.

Name: Commission on Human Rights
Description: ECOSOC functional commission overseeing international human rights, monitoring human rights conditions, providing recommendations. -> Replace by the Human Rights Council in 2006.
CommentLabel: Replaced by the Human Rights Council

Name: Economic Commission for Europe (ECE)
Description: Promotes pan‑European economic integration; standard‑setting in transport, environment, housing, statistics; supports sustainable development.

Name: Economic Commission for Latin America and the Caribbean (ECLAC)
Description: Promotes economic development, social equity, regional integration; conducts research & technical cooperation.

Name: Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific (ESCAP)
Description: Advances inclusive economic & social development in Asia‑Pacific; sets regional policy, provides technical assistance.

Name: Economic Commission for Africa (ECA)
Description: Promotes economic and social development in Africa; supports regional integration, capacity‑building, and policy research.

Name: Economic and Social Commission for Western Asia (ESCWA)
Description: Promotes economic & social development in Western Asia; conducts research, provides policy advice, strengthens regional cooperation.

Name: Committee on Non‑Governmental Organizations
Description: Evaluates applications and grants consultative status for NGOs; reviews NGO activities under ECOSOC.

Name: Committee for Programme and Coordination
Description: Reviews UN program implementation; provides advice to ECOSOC on UN system‑wide coordination and budget planning.
